segments.text: Are you sure that this is the place to wait for our school bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Look , other kids are coming this way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it doesn't look like a real bus stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's because regular buses don't stop here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is it going to cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go sit in the back . All the cool kids do .
segments.speaker: S2
